did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: William Burnham Alexander, 1877-1957, was an engineer. The collection includes correspondence, agreements, description of agricultural lands of the Rillito and Santa Cruz Rivers in Pima County, articles of incorporation of the Federal Power and Water Co., and various related documents pertaining to water power projects in the Coronado National Forest area in Arizona as proposed by the Great Western Power Co., the Sabino Canyon Power and Irrigation Project of Pima County, and the Federal Power and Water Co.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, agreements, description of agricultural lands of the Rillito and Santa Cruz Rivers in Pima County, articles of incorporation of the Federal Power and Water Co., and various related documents pertaining to water power projects in the Coronado National Forest area in Arizona as proposed by the Great Western Power Co., the Sabino Canyon Power and Irrigation Project of Pima County, and the Federal Power and Water Co.
